direction.raw_text: A familiar beam of light shines down. The beam of light descends onto a stage. Lightning flashes to reveal Prince Charming riding his valiant steed Chauncey across the open plains. The wind blows back his golden mane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Onward Chauncey, to the highest room of the tallest tower! Where my princess awaits rescue from her handsome Prince Charming. Lightning cracks. Thunder booms. Charming straddles a wooden hobby horse and gallops in place. A stage hand uses a bellow to blow air into Prince Charming's face. Another stage hand turns a crank that creates the moving background. In the orchestra, a man uses coconuts to create the sound effects of a galloping horse. Two more stage hands back stage create the cheap sound effects of thunder and lightning. A crudely constructed castle tower sits in front of a cheaply painted backdrop. The Fairytale Creatures are sitting at a table in the audience.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is worse than Love Letters! I hate dinner theatre.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me too. Pinocchio's nose grows as he is caught in the lie. Prince Charming rides to the base of the tower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa there, Chauncey! He dismounts and sets his hobby horse on the ground. He strikes a dramatic pose. A Princess leans from a tower window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hark! The brave Prince Charming approach-ith. Prince Charming puffs his chest out. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 2.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fear not fair maiden! I shall slay the monster that guards you and take my place as rightful King. An old couple at a table look confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to old man) What did she say? Prince Charming glares as the bored audience largely ignores him. A man in a bad ogre costume comes onto the stage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grrrrrrr! The crowd erupts into applause. The Fairytale Creatures cheer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Woooo hoooo!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yea! Shrek! At first, Prince Charming is put off by the cheers for the Shrek-like beast. He pulls his sword and confronts the monster.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Prepare foul beast to enter into a world of pain with which you are not familiar! He is cut off as a waiter enters with a birthday cake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Happy Birthday to thee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you mind? Prince Charming hops out of the way when a chair lands on stage. It slides past him and bumps into the tower facade.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you mind? Bo-ring! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 3. The audience laughs. Prince Charming glares at them and then tries to recover. He points his sword at the monster again. The tower facade starts to topple.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Prepare foul beast- Prince Charming looks over his shoulder and sees the facade falling. He cringes. The scenery slams against the stage, but Prince Charming is unharmed, perfectly framed in the princesses' window. The crowd laughs at the embarrassed Prince Charming. He shakes his mangled sword at the audience.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shaking his sword again) Someday you'll be sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) We already are! They laugh again. Prince Charming throws down his sword, picks up his hobby horse and exits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grrrrrrr! The song and the laughter follow Prince Charming backstage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Prince Charming walks through a tunnel backstage that leads to a door. The door has a star with his name written on it. He opens it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Prince Charming sits at his broken vanity and sobs. His make- shift dressing room is in an alley way next to the theater. Horses whinny as a carriage passes by. The castle of Far Far Away can be seen on the hill in the background. Prince Charming breaks down and cries. He looks up and sees a picture of the Fairy Godmother taped to the vanity. "Don't stop believing! Mommy's Little Angel" is written on the picture. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 4.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh mommy. He weeps again and then looks back at the picture. A determined change grows across his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, you're right. I can't let this happen. I can't. Prince Charming looks at the castle on the hill. His expression hardens. He stands and faces the castle. He holds his chin up high.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am the rightful King of Far Far Away and I promise you this mother. I will restore dignity to my throne! A big gust of wind blows a newspaper page across his face. He peels it off and looks at the headline. His eyes tense and narrow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And this time, no one will stand in my way! In the newspaper is a picture of Shrek and Fiona waving to a crowd. Prince Charming crumples up the newspaper in his fists.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The camera booms down from the Far Far Away sign. The sun rises and the birds sing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The sun shines through the bedroom window as the camera pans over to Shrek and Fiona waking up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good morning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good morning. (DREAMY) Oh... morning breath... Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 5. Shrek breathes in and smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. Isn't it wonderful? The bedroom doors fly open and Donkey and the Dronkeys rush in. The Dronkeys head right for Shrek and Fiona. Shrek cowers beneath the bedclothes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Good morning! Good morning!" Shrek sinks further into the blankets as the Dronkeys exuberantly lick him. Fiona is amused. Donkey starts to sing "Good Morning" from Singin' in the Rain as he enters the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "The sun is shining through! Good morning! Good morning. (coming closer and closer
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "To you!" (TO SHREK) "And you!" (TO DRONKEY) And you! The Dronkeys fly out of the room, knocking down everything in their path.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, they grow up so fast. Shrek, greatly annoyed, lifts his hand and snuffs out a little fire on the bed left behind by the Dronkeys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not fast enough. Puss leaps onto the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. You have a very full day filling in for the King and Queen. There are several functions that require your attendance, sir. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 6.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great! Let's get started. Shrek immediately pulls the covers up over his head and starts to snore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, lazy bones, time to get movin'! Donkey yanks the sheets off of Fiona and Shrek. He is surprised to see Shrek's bare legs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aaahhh! You know you really need to get yourself a pair of jammies. Shrek sighs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The camera pans down from a stained glass window. The song "Royal Pain" by the Eels plays in the background as the title: "Shrek The Third" is superimposed. A large crowd has gathered to watch the knighting. Shrek walks down the aisle of the church. Shrek walks up to the knight who seems a bit nervous. Shrek takes a sword from Puss, but he doesn't have any idea what he is supposed to do with it. Shrek looks at Puss, who indicates how to knight a person with his own sword. Shrek starts to knight the knight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I knight thee... Shrek accidentally stabs the knight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He-he. Ooh. The crowd, Fiona, Puss and Donkey look on, shocked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 7.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shrek and Fiona officiate at a boat christening for the Royal Navy. Shrek is holding a bottle of champagne. He leans on the boat, accidentally pushing it down the ramp. Shrek throws the bottle at the boat and it punches an enormous hole in the side of the hull. The boat quickly sinks. Shrek turns to find the patrons of Far Far Away shaking their heads as they leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Raul, the make-up specialist, tightens some aprons around Shrek and Fiona. Donkey, Puss and Raul stand in front of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, since you're filling in for one, you might as well look like a real King. Can somebody come in here and work on Shrek please? Raul stares at Shrek. Shrek raises his eyebrow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will see what I can do. He unrolls a satchel full of different gardening tools. Suddenly Shrek's arms and legs are strapped into a chair. A man stands with his back to the camera and pulls on a rip cord as if he's holding a chain saw. VROOM! VROOM! He turns around to reveal a circular sander and starts to grind away at Shrek's gruesome toenails. Shrek cringes. We see a close-up of Shrek's eye. A mascara brush comes into frame and pulls at Shrek's eyelash. Fiona gets her nose hairs plucked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ow! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 8. Lipstick is applied to some lips. The camera pulls back to reveal that the lips are Shrek's. A hand tries to tighten a zipper on Shrek's back. It keeps snagging on the skin until they finally rip it past and tighten up the zipper all the way. A small sock is placed onto Shrek's foot. With a shoe horn, Shrek's foot is shoved into a small shoe. POP! A collar is placed around Fiona's neck and her corset is tightened. A drill comes into frame and tightens the rivet on Shrek's belt. A mole is placed on his cheek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Shrek and Fiona standing awkwardly in outrageous Renaissance outfits. Donkey gasps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh! Puss rolls his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, wow. Fiona is uncomfortable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, is this really necessary?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ho, ho. Quite necessary, Fiona.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm Shrek, you twit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay peoples! This isn't a rehearsal. Let's see some hustle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smiles everyone, smiles! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 9. Off-screen, the Master of Ceremonies announces the couples arriving at the party. Fiona turns to Shrek and sees he is not in a good mood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know how much longer I can keep this up Fiona.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry Shrek, but can you please just try to grin and bear it? It's just until Dad gets better. Shrek lets out another frustrated sigh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shrek?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You look handsome.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah. Come here, you. She gives him a supportive smile. He relaxes and smiles back. Fiona puckers up her lips and Shrek leans in for a kiss, but their bulky outfits prevent it. Shrek and Fiona let out a huge breath of air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, my butt is itching up a storm and I can't reach it in this monkey suit! Shrek tries to scratch his butt but to no avail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. (WHISTLE) Hey you. Come here! A man holding a ruby scepter walks over to Shrek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's your name? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 10.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eh, Fiddlesworth, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hoo hoo hooo. Perfect.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The announcer introduces Shrek and Fiona.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ladies and gentlemen, Princess Fiona and Sir Shrek! The audience claps. The curtain starts to open. Fiddlesworth is scratching away at Shrek's butt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've done it. Oh, a little over to the left, yeah. That's great.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh Shrek? Fiddlesworth struggles to reach Shrek's itch. The crowd looks on in horror. Fiona tries to get his attention.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahh! All right, you got it...Oh yeah, you're on it. Oh that's it! Oh that's good!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shrek...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh yeah! Scratch that thing! You got it. You're on it. That's great!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Shrek and Fiddlesworth finally see the crowd. They both freeze. Shrek laughs nervously. Suddenly Shrek's belt buckle snaps off and hits Donkey in the eye. He stumbles through the crowd screaming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ow!! My eye! My eye! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 11. As he is stumbling, he grabs hold of a lady in the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing? The woman pushes Donkey away. He falls, knocking over a guard holding an axe on his way down. The guard drops the axe. It flies past Puss, who is in the arms of a lady. The axe knocks over a vase. The vase flies up on stage and Fiona maneuvers to catch it. In flight, water spills out of the vase which causes Fiona to fall over. Shrek's tuxedo bib slaps him in the face. The clasp holding Shrek's pants up breaks off. Shrek stands on stage with his pants around his ankles. He shuffles towards Fiona.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fiona! He trips over his pants and hits a loose wooden plank on the stage. The plank flings up and sends Fiddlesworth flying through the air where his jacket slips over a banner pole, trapping him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uhhh... (WIMPER) Shrek has reached Fiona who is still lying on the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. I'm fine. Fiona's eyes suddenly widen. Fiddlesworth's jacket rips and he falls onto a waiter carrying flaming skewers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahhhh! The skewers fly through the air. Donkey stands up in frame with one eye half shut. The flaming skewers shoot by him and land in the curtains, setting them on fire. He blows one of the skewers out and takes a bite.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh! Shrimp! My favorite. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 12. The fire causes a Far Far Away shield to detach from a wooden ceiling beam and fall onto the stage, breaking it in half. The whole stage collapses in the middle. The buffet tables slide toward Shrek and Fiona at the other end and collide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! BANG!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The door to Fiona's room flies open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it! We're leaving! Shrek storms in pulling bits of buffet food off his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Honey, please calm down... Shrek grabs the wig off of his head and throws it aside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Calm down? Who do you think we're kidding? I am an ogre! I'm not cut out for this, Fiona and I never will be. Shrek wipes off his makeup with his shirt sleeve and flings his shirt to the floor. He falls onto the bed next to Donkey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think that went pretty well. Shrek startles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Donkey! Shrek picks him up and throws him out the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aww, come on now Shrek! Shrek slams the door shut. Shrek turns back towards the bed and sees Puss reclining on his pillow. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 13.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some people just don't understand boundaries. Shrek picks Puss up by the scruff of his neck and tosses him outside the window. He shuts it. Puss sits sadly on the ledge, giving Shrek his sad-eyes routine. Shrek draws the blinds. Shrek stomps over and falls back onto the bed. Fiona tries to calm him down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just think... a couple more days, and we'll be back home in our vermin-filled shack, strewn with fungus, filled with the rotting stench of mud and neglect. This thought calms him. Shrek takes in a long, deep breath and exhales. He smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, you had me at "vermin-filled."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And, uh... maybe even the pitter- patter of little feet on the floor...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's right. The swamp rats will be spawning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, no... you know, what I was thinking of is a little bit bigger than a swamp rat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Donkey?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Shrek. Um... what if -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They were little ogre feet? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 14.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. (NERVOUS LAUGH) Shocked, Shrek falls off the bed. He slowly emerges from behind the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Honey? Let's try and be rational about this. Have you seen a baby lately? They just eat and poop and they cry and then they cry when they poop and they poop when they cry...Now, imagine an ogre baby. They extra cry and they extra poop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shrek. She grabs his hands and looks deeply into his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you ever think about having a family? Shrek takes her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right now, you're my family. There is a knock on the bedroom door. The door bursts open, revealing a Royal Page. Shrek springs up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, somebody better be dying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The camera pushes through a corridor that leads to the King's bedroom. The King is lying on his lily pad, coughing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm dying. The King inhales and launches into a violent coughing fit. Shrek looks a bit guilty about his last admission. The Queen comes to the King's aid and he settles down. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 15.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Harold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't forget to pay the gardener, Lillian. The Queen is used to these kind of non-sequiturs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course darling. The King suppresses a few coughs. He turns to his daughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fiona...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes Daddy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know I've made many mistakes with you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But your love for Shrek has taught me so much. Fiona smiles. The King addresses Shrek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My dear boy, I am proud to call you my son.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I'm proud to call you my Frog... King Dad in-law. Shrek smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, there is a matter of business to attend tooo... The King starts wheezing and coughing. Eventually he stops. They think he's dead. Puss solemnly removes his hat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Frog King is dead. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 16. Fiona starts crying. The King suddenly wakes up, coughing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Put your hat back on, fool.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shrek, please come hither. Fiona gives Shrek a look. Shrek walks over to the King.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, Dad?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This Kingdom needs a new king. You and Fiona are next in line for the throne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooo. Next in line. Now you see Dad, that's why people love you. Even on your deathbed you're still making jokes. The King stares at Shrek, stone-faced. Shrek leans in closer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, come on Dad...an Ogre as King? I don't think that's such a good idea. There's got to be somebody else. Anybody?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aside from you there is only one remaining heir. Shrek brightens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really!? Who is he, Dad?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His name is... is... is...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's his name? What's his name?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...is ... Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 17. Shrek leans in closer after each "is," waiting in anticipation. The King starts to hyperventilate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daddy! The King is dead. A fly comes out of his mouth and flies away. Puss starts to take his hat off. The fly buzzes into frame. A tongue catches it. Puss puts his hat back on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (chewing the fly) His name is Arthur.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Arthur?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know you'll do what's... (EXHALING) riiiight... He succumbs. The King really is dead now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Harold!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad? Dad? Dad? Donkey bows his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do your thing, man. Puss takes his hat off. Fiona starts to cry and hugs Shrek. The weight of the King's request hits Shrek. He is in a state of shock. We hold a moment on the Queen, Shrek, Fiona, Puss and Donkey to let the King's passing sink in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 18.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The streets of Far Far Away are empty. People are closing up the shops on Rodeo Drive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The knights of Far Far Away march toward the castle as the flag is lowered to half-masked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Close on a statue of the late King. Shrek, Fiona, the Queen, and all the Fairy-tale Creatures and Princesses have gathered for the funeral. The Queen sets an old shoe box ("Ye Olde Footlocker") on top of a lily pad and sends it floating out into the water. An overhead shot shows the box floating through the lily pads. The camera tilts up to reveal a frog choir, singing "Live and Let Die." The Princesses, Donkey, Puss and the Fairy-tale Creatures all bow their heads solemnly. Shrek puts his arm around Fiona. The funeral has ended and the crowd begins to disperse. Shrek, Fiona and the Queen stand by the pond. The Queen sadly gazes at the pond.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The camera pulls back to reveal a cloaked figure, on horseback, overlooking the funeral. The figure removes his hood to reveal Prince Charming. He gives a smug smile, and rides off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Prince Charming rides up to the Poison Apple Bar. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 19.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smoke wafts through the screen. The camera pans down to the top of a piano where an ashtray with a lit cigarette burns and a brandy sifter is filled with coins. The camera pans over to a Singing Witch who turns around to reveal a microphone in her hand. The Singing Witch starts to sing "I've Never Been To Me" by Nancy Wilson. The bar is filled with various Fairy-tale Villains. Two pirates sit forlornly with their mugs. The Puppet Master takes a drink out of a beer mug. He is surrounded by a bunch of empty beer mugs. Prince Charming enters the bar. A group is gathered around Cyclops riding a medieval mechanical bull, hooting and hollering. The bull stops and the Villains turn to look at Prince Charming. Prince Charming hangs his cape on a tree branch. The camera adjusts right to reveal the branch is actually one of the Evil Trees, who flings the cape to the floor. Everyone takes notice as Prince Charming walks through. Little Red Riding Hood is sitting on a pile of books at a table. Evil Dwarves glare in Prince Charming's direction. Prince Charming walks by a pair of witches (one is the Evil Queen from Snow White) playing pool. The Evil Queen scratches when she sees him and the pool ball goes flying into the Headless Horseman's neck. Prince Charming walks by the singing witch. He reaches the bar, pulls out a handkerchief, places it over the bar stool, and sits. Prince Charming spots the bartender with her back to him. He clears his throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does a Prince have to do to get a drink around here? Mabel, the other ugly stepsister, rises up in front a poster with a smiling beer wench.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah Mabel, why they call you an ugly stepsister I'll never know. He winks at her. She glares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's Doris, taking the night off? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 20.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's not welcome here and neither are you. She spits into the mug and wipes it with a towel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you want, Charming?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh not much, just a chance at redemption... (LAUGHS) And a Fuzzy Navel. Prince Charming stands up and turns to the bar patrons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And Fuzzy Navels for all my friends! Captain Hook rips his hook across the piano keys. The singing witch bares her teeth. The witches break their pool cues. The Puppet Master breaks his beer mug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're not your friends. Prince Charming grows nervous. The Villains all approach Prince Charming. From behind the bar, Mabel grabs Prince Charming by his shoulders and pins him on top of the bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahh! Captain Hook places his hook against Prince Charming's neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't belong here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're right; oh, I mean you're absolutely right, but I mean, do any of us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do a number on his face! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 21.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no, wait, wait, wait! We are more alike than you think. Prince Charming turns to the Evil Queen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wicked Witch. The Seven Dwarves saved Snow White and then what happened?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, what's it to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They left you the un-fairest of them all. And now here you are, hustling pool to get your next meal. How does that feel?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty unfair. Prince Charming begins to work the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you? Your star puppet abandons the show to go and find his father.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hate that little wooden puppet. Prince Charming turns to Captain Hook.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And Hook... Prince Charming looks down at the hook.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Need I say more? Captain Hook backs off, feeling insecure about his appendage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you! Frumpypigskin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rumplestiltskin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's that first-born you were promised, hey? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 22. Rumplestiltskin caresses a pacifier tattoo on his forearm. Prince Charming gains more confidence as he confronts Mabel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mabel, remember how you couldn't get your little fat foot into that tiny glass slipper? Mabel sighs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cinderella is in Far Far Away right now, eating Bon Bons, cavorting with every little last Fairy-tale Creature that has ever done you wrong. Prince Charming now has everyone's attention.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Once upon a time, someone decided that we were the losers. But there are two sides to every story. And our side has not been told. The crowd listens, rapt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll start letting yourself go...

direction.raw_text: She's right. A baby is only gonna strengthen the love that Shrek and Fiona have. How did Shrek react when you told him? Tell me! Fiona smiles.

direction.raw_text: (LAUGHING) Onward my new friends. (MORE) Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 48.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To our happily ever afters! Ha ha ha ha ha! A bug flies into his mouth.

direction.raw_text: Gaa! Gulp! Ahhhh! Prince Charming takes the bug out of his mouth.

direction.raw_text: Now, bombs away! From the sky, Prince Charming, Cyclops and the Evil Witches swoop down in "winged" formation on the broomsticks. The Evil Trees are dropped like bombs. They pull their branches (i.e. rip cord) to activate their plumage as parachutes. Prince Charming and his army dive bomb towards Rodeo Drive.

direction.raw_text: shot of an Evil Witch flying over Rodeo Drive. People are diving out of her way. The Evil Trees land, surrounding the shoppers, who flee in terror.

direction.raw_text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha! A shadow falls over the child, and he looks up to reveal Captain Hook and the Headless Horseman on horseback.

The excited patrons race back in. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 49. An Evil Knight scares the patrons of Farbucks away and then takes a seat to drink the unfinished coffee. Another Villain throws a cart through a store window. Cyclops rips the stamps off some envelopes, puts the envelopes back in the mailbox and laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha, ha, ha, ha! The camera pans up to Prince Charming on the broomstick flying down Rodeo Drive.

direction.raw_text: Enough pillaging! To the castle! Prince Charming, on the broom, leads the Fairy-tale Villains up to the castle.

direction.raw_text: The Evil Witches surround the castle. Dragon takes down one of the witches flying by, but more Evil Witches circle her. Fiona runs to the window. The Evil Witches drop a metal net over Dragon. She struggles.

direction.raw_text: Roarrrr!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The Fairy-tale Creatures run to barricade the door. The Three Pigs and Pinocchio push a dresser and other furniture in front of the door. The Fairy-tale Creatures are fortifying the room. They brace themselves against the furniture.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You go and take care of the baby! The Princesses panic. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 50.

direction.raw_text: Everybody stay calm. We're all going to die! Doris slaps Snow White to calm her down.

direction.raw_text: Everyone in! Now.

direction.raw_text: Yee-haw! Ow.

direction.raw_text: ! The door is starting to give way.

direction.raw_text: We don't have time. Now go!

direction.raw_text: Quickly ladies! The Princesses go down the stairs.

direction.raw_text: We'll hold them off as long as we can!

direction.raw_text: ! There is a loud explosion and the door blows open. Prince Charming and the Fairy-tale Villains enter. He spots the Fairy-tale Creatures having a tea party. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 51.

direction.raw_text: Where are Shrek and Fiona?

direction.raw_text: Name doesn't ring a bell.

direction.raw_text: No bell! The Fairy-tale Creatures go back to drinking their tea.

direction.raw_text: I suggest you freaks cooperate with the new King of Far Far Away.

direction.raw_text: Start talkin'! Gingerbread Man tries to hold strong, but passes out. A montage of Gingerbread Man's life flashes before his eyes.

direction.raw_text: Gingy! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 52.

direction.raw_text: Papa!

direction.raw_text: Settle down, now. Gingerbread Man graduates.

direction.raw_text: Gingerbread Man is running on a treadmill, doing his rehabilitation.

direction.raw_text: Gingerbread Man is running through a wheat field.

direction.raw_text: Gingerbread Man is still in a dream state singing. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 53.

direction.raw_text: "On the Good Ship Lollypop, It's a sweet trip, To the candy shop, Where the Bon Bons play, On the sunny beach of Peppermint Bay.." Prince Charming becomes frustrated, he turns Pinocchio's head towards him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You! You can't lie. So tell me puppet... Where is Shrek?! Pinocchio thinks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I don't know where he's not. Prince Charming gets in Pinocchio's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're telling me you don't know where Shrek is? Pinocchio is still a little nervous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It wouldn't be inaccurate to assume that I couldn't exactly not say that is or isn't almost partially incorrect. Pinocchio thinks he has the upper hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you do know where he is!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On the contrary, I'm possibly more or less, not definitely rejecting the idea, that in no way, with any amount of uncertainty that...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I undeniably do or do not know where he shouldn't probably be. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 54. Captain Hook scratches his head, even the Three Little Pigs are frustrated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If that indeed wasn't where he isn't. Even if he wasn't not where I knew he was could mean that I wouldn't completely not know where he wasn't. Gingerbread Man continues to sing his "Lollipop Song."

direction.raw_text: Oh, enough! Shrek went off to bring back the next heir! Oh! The pig realizes his admission and immediately covers his mouth. Pinocchio laughs nervously.

direction.raw_text: He's bringing back the next heir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Pinocchio's nose grows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hook! Get rid of this new "King."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But bring Shrek to me. I have something special in mind for him.

direction.raw_text: He'll never fall for your tricks! Pinocchio's nose grows again.

direction.raw_text: Oh boy.

direction.raw_text: The boat cuts through the open sea. Artie smiles as he watches Worcestershire shrinking away on the horizon. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 55.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't believe it... me a King? I...I mean I knew I came from royalty and all, but I just figured everyone forgot about me. He looks out to sea, disbelieving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no, in fact, the King asked for you personally. Artie smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really? Wow! Look, I know it's not all gonna be fun and games.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It really is all fun and games, actually. Sure, you have to knight a few heroes, launch a ship or two. By the way, make sure you hit the boat just right with the bottle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boat with the bottle? Any idiot can hit a boat with a bottle. Shrek chuckles sheepishly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I've heard it's harder than it looks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa!! This is gonna be huge. Parties, princesses, castles... princesses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's gonna be great, Artie. You'll be living in the lap of luxury. They got the finest chefs around waiting for you to place your order. Puss jumps up onto the railing next to Artie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And fortunately you'll have the royal food tasters. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 56.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh yeah? What do they do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They taste the food before the King eats, to make sure it's not poisoned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Poisoned? Shrek senses trouble and immediately steps in.

direction.raw_text: Or too salty! Shrek turns to Puss and Donkey, trying to shut them up.

direction.raw_text: Don't worry about it. You'll be safe and sound with the help of your body guards.

direction.raw_text: Body guards?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All of them, willing at a moment's notice to lay down their own lives out of devotion to you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Si, and the whole kingdom will look to you for wisdom and guidance. Behind Artie, Shrek mouths "shut-up" to Puss and Donkey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just make sure they don't die of famine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or plague.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, plague is bad. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 57.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The coughing, the groaning, the festering sores. Shrek interrupts with a mock laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh! Festering sores! Hey, you are one funny kitty cat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did I say?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't want Artie here getting the wrong idea. Shrek motions to Artie, but he's gone. They all look around.

direction.raw_text: Uh, Artie? The boat suddenly pitches to the right. Shrek braces himself. Puss and Donkey tumble away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa! Artie swings the wheel around, sending the boat back in the direction of his school. Shrek works his way into the cabin and gains control of the wheel. The drunken Ship Captain slides by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa! Oh, there goes my hip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artie! Shrek turns the wheel the other way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?! The boat veers again, heading back toward Far Far Away. Artie falls to the ground and slides to the back of the boat. A shuffle board stick slides next to Artie. He grabs it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does it look like?! He jams it in the boat's wheel. The boat lurches. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 58. He swings the boat back in the other direction. Shrek rises up and grabs the wheel and turns it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This really isn't up to you! Artie falls underneath the wheel. He stands up shoving the wheel back the other way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I don't know anything about being King!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll learn on the job! Donkey and Puss roll across the deck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoaaa! Shrek grabs the wheel and swings it around. Artie yanks the wheel. They wrestle for control.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry to disappoint you, but I'm going back!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back to what? Being a loser?! As soon as the word leaves his lips, Shrek knows he's gone too far. Stung, Artie lets go of the wheel, leaving Shrek to yank hard on it. He pulls the steering column from the decking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now look what you did!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look what I did? Who's holding the wheel chief? Donkey climbs up onto the railing. He is seasick and is about to puke when he sees jagged rocks ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shrek! Shrek desperately sets the wheel back down and tries to steer the ship clear of the rocks. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 59. The camera pans past the boat. Off-screen we hear the boat crash into the rocks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Land ho!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shrek, holding Puss and Donkey, staggers onto a small beach. He glares at Artie who pulls himself out of the surf. Shrek drops Puss and Donkey. Puss, tired of being wet, shakes himself vigorously. His fur puffs up into a fro. He drops his head in shame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How humiliating...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, nice going, Your Highness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, so now it's "Your highness?" What happened to "loser?" Huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, if you think this is getting you out of anything, well it isn't. We're heading back to Far Far Away one way or another, and you're gonna be a father! Artie raises an eyebrow. Puss and Donkey stare at Shrek uncomfortably.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (clearing his throat) A-hem. You just said father...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're... I said king. You're gonna be King!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "You're gonna be King!" Yeah right. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 60. Artie shakes his head and marches down the beach toward a path into the woods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where do you think you're going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Far Far Away... from you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You get back here young man and I mean it! Artie keeps climbing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh boss, I don't think he's coming back and maybe it's for the best. He is not exactly king material. Shrek looks towards Artie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When were you planning on telling him that you were really supposed to be King?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh c'mon, now why would I do that? Besides, he'll be ten times better at it than me. Shrek starts off after Artie. Donkey jumps in front of Shrek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, woah ho ho, Shrek. Then you're gonna have to change your tactics if you want to get anywhere with this kid. Beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're right, Donkey. Shrek picks up a piece of driftwood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about this? Donkey shakes his head in disgust. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 61.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shrek! Shrek tosses the log.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh c'mon. It's just a joke. (LAUGHS) Still... Shrek walks off, trying to catch up to Artie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artie marches up the mountain trail. Shrek thinks for a moment and then tries a different tactic with the kid. He catches up to Artie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen Artie... Artie looks back over his shoulder. He sees Shrek and just keeps going.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you think this whole mad scene ain't dope, I feel you dude. I mean, I'm not trying to get up in your grill or raise your roof or whatever, but what I am screaming is, yo, check out this kazing thazing bazaby. Puss and Donkey glance at each other. Artie notices a cottage in the distance and heads toward it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, if it doesn't groove or what I'm saying ain't straight trippin', just say, oh no you didn't, you know, you're gettin' on my last nerve. And then I'll know it's... then I'll know it's whack-- Passing a tree, Artie nonchalantly releases the branch, striking Shrek square in the face and takes off running. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 62.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A boiling soup pot sits over a fire in front of a small shack. Artie charges though, pounding desperately on the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! I'VE BEEN KIDNAPPED BY A MONSTER TRYING TO RELATE TO ME!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artie! Wait! Shrek, Puss, and Donkey run into the camp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon! C'mon! Help! Help! Hello? Suddenly, a burst of light shoots through a candle box that is hung on the door. A bright, colorful image of an old wizard's head is projected out. Donkey is terrified.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: I'VE BEEN KIDNAPPED BY A MONSTER TRYING TO RELATE TO ME

direction.raw_text: Greetings cosmic children of the universe, and welcome to my serenity circle! Shrek watches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please leave any bad vibes outside the healing vortex. And now prepare ... With a "FZZZZT" and a "BLOOP", the image disappears. The door opens and a tiny old man, Merlin, comes out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I knew I should of gotten that warranty! Merlin smashes the security device with his little fist and is promptly zapped in the head. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 63.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Ow, ow, ow, ow, ow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Merlin?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know this guy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. He was the school's magic teacher until he had his nervous breakdown.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, technically I was merely a victim of a level three fatigue, and at the request of my therapist and the school authorities, I have retired to the tranquility of nature to discover my divine purpose. Merlin smacks a fly that has landed on his head. Shrek and Artie stare in astonishment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, can I interest anyone in a snack or beverage?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, no. Merlin offers up a baking dish full of rocks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure you don't wanna try my famous rock au-gratin? Merlin takes a bite and chews loudly. His gums are bleeding from eating rocks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's organic! They both stare at him uncomfortably. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 64.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, thanks, I just ate a boulder on the way in. What we need are directions back to Far Far Away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's with the "we"? Who said I was going with you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I did. Cause there's a lot of people counting on you so don't try and weasel out of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If it's such a great job, why don't you do it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Understand this kid, it's no more Mr. Nice Guy from here on out!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, so that was your "Mr. Nice Guy?"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, and I'm gonna miss him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what? Why don't you go terrorize a village and leave me alone?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, is that some kind of crack about ogres? You get your royal highness to Far Far Away before I kick it there. (TO MERLIN) Now which way am I kicking?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I could tell you. But since you're in the midst of self- destructive rage spiral it would be karmic-ly irresponsible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Self-destructive ra... (TO MERLIN) Look, are you gonna help us or not? Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 65.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Most definitely, but only after you take the journey to your soul.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I don't think so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look pal, it's either that or some primal scream therapy. Ahhhhhhhhhh! Shrek grabs Merlin's mouth and closes it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, alright... journey to the soul...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A fire blazes. Merlin throws a handful of dirt into the fire, it flares.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now all of you, look into the "Fire of Truth" and tell me what you see! Yah! Ha! (Wild war cry) Woo-looo-looo-looo! He points at the smoke and it starts to form objects (i.e. Rorschach inkblots). Puss and Donkey, excited, sit by the fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooo! Charades! Okay, I see a dutch fudge torte with cinnamon swirls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Monster, go for it. Shrek glances at the fire. The stroller from his nightmare begins to take shape in the smoke. He blows the image away. He covers his fear and changes the subject.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see a rainbow pony. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 66.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excellent work! (THEN) Now! The boy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is lame. Merlin whacks Artie on the back of the head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ow!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're lame! Now just go for it. He tosses more dirt and flames burst up. Artie studies it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. There's a baby bird and a father bird sitting in a nest. Merlin starts beating a drum. Artie's expression starts to change as he stays focused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! Stay with it! Stay with it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait, the dad just flew away. Why did he leave the little bird all alone? Shrek starts to take this in as he watches. Artie gets more worked up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's trying to fly, but it doesn't know how to. It.. it's gonna fall! Suddenly, Artie catches what he said. As the smoke drifts away, he looks and sees everyone else staring back at him, stunned.

direction.raw_text: Whew, proper head case you are, aren't you? Really messed up. Whoa. Merlin goes back inside. They all stare at Artie. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 67.

direction.raw_text: Yeah, yeah, okay. I get it. The bird's me. My dad left. So what? Donkey gives Shrek a nudge to go over and talk to Artie. Shrek hesitates and Donkey insists.

direction.raw_text: Look Artie...um- Just as he's about to get going, "That's What Friends Are For" starts playing loudly from Merlin's security device drowning out any conversation. They all turn toward the shack where Merlin peeks out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (loud, over the music) Just thought I might help set the mood! Y'know for your big heart to heart chat! Everyone stares at him. He sheepishly turns off the device and shuts the door. It's quiet again.

direction.raw_text: I know what it's like to not feel ready for something. Artie looks at him.

direction.raw_text: Even ogres get scared...you know, once in a while.

direction.raw_text: I know you want me to be king, but I can't. I'm not cut out for it and I never will be, alright? Shrek takes this in.

direction.raw_text: Even my own dad knew I wasn't worth the trouble. He dumped me at that school the first chance he got and I never heard from him again. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 68.

direction.raw_text: My dad wasn't really the fatherly type either.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I doubt he was worse than mine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh yeah? My father was an ogre. He tried to eat me. Artie looks at Shrek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, I guess I should have seen it coming. He used to give me a bath in barbecue sauce and put me to bed with an apple in my mouth. Artie chuckles at this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay... I guess that's... pretty bad. Artie laughs and then pokes at the fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, it may be hard to believe what with my obvious charm and good looks, but people used to think that I was a monster. And for a long time, I believed them. Artie looks up at Shrek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But after awhile, you learn to ignore the names that people call you and you just trust who you are. Artie gently pokes at the embers with a stick for a moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, you're okay, Shrek. He tosses the stick into the fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You just need to do a little less yelling and use a little more soap. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 69.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks Artie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The soap's because you stink. Really bad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. I got that. The camera slowly booms up and away from the group as the fire continues to burn.

direction.raw_text: The Princesses, Fiona and the Queen are surrounded by darkness as they tiptoe down the steps and into the catacombs below the castle. They round a corner and step onto a ledge with Fiona leading the way, holding a torch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh this place is filthy. I feel like a hobo. Fiona tries to keep her frustration in check.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry but this just isn't working for me. Sleeping Beauty, still being carried by Doris, wakes up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everything's always about you, isn't it? It's not like your attitude is helping, Snow.

direction.raw_text: Well maybe it just bothers you that I was voted fairest in the land.

direction.raw_text: You mean in that rigged election?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, give me a break. (gesturing toward hair) (MORE) Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 70.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) "Rapunzel, Rapunzel, let down thy golden extensions!"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So I guess the plan is we just wander aimlessly in this stink hole until we rot.

direction.raw_text: No, we're gonna get inside and find out what Charming's up to.

Evil dwarves are busy painting the set. The finishing touches are put on the stage tower. The Princesses hug the wall as a group of guards march by. Rapunzel takes off in the other direction, and signals the Princesses to follow her. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 71.

direction.raw_text: Come on, this way!

direction.raw_text: Rapunzel. Wait! Fiona and the Princesses race after Rapunzel. They spot her sprinting into the castle and follow her. They burst through the doors and see Prince Charming holding Rapunzel by the arm.

direction.raw_text: Charming, let go of her. A large group of armed Far Far Away Guards surround them. Prince Charming smiles at Fiona.

direction.raw_text: Grrrr!

Everyone wears a look of defeat. The guards march them off. Fiona and the princesses are locked away in a prison cell. Fiona looks through the bars of the cell, feeling helpless.

direction.raw_text: Shrek startles awake. He sits up and scratches his head, looking around. He realizes it's morning. Behind him a peaceful bird lands on a tree branch. Suddenly, the tree branch that was holding the bird flicks it off. Shrek senses the movement behind him and turns around to find everything is normal. He turns back around to wake up everyone. The trees start to advance toward Shrek. The log Artie is sleeping on suddenly sits up, knocking Artie, who is still asleep, to the ground. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 73.

direction.raw_text: Ow! The tree turns around to reveal an Evil Tree. Donkey finally wakes up.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kill `em all. Except the fat one. He stares hard at Shrek and aims his hooked prosthetic.

direction.raw_text: ! One lands and gets his peg-leg stuck in the ground. The pirates close in. Shrek grabs one and throws him to the side. One pirate raises his sword and prepares to swing at Artie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artie, Duck! Shrek pushes Artie's head down and the sword narrowly misses him. The pirate prepares to swing again and Shrek lifts Artie above his head. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 74. Still in the air, Artie uses both legs to kick the pirate to the ground. Shrek and Artie share a satisfied look. A pirate charges Donkey.

direction.raw_text: Ahhh! Puss draws his sword and begins fighting off the pirate, protecting Donkey.

direction.raw_text: Ha-ha! Argh!

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ready the plank! A wooden board is thrown on a stump, creating a makeshift "plank." The pirates back Shrek onto the plank. Several pirates with swords force Shrek onto the plank. He is backed up to the edge of the plank and falls into a waiting treasure chest below. Several pirates try to shut the lid on him. Puss, Donkey and Artie are trying to hold off the Villains. Suddenly, two Evil Trees come into frame and scoop Puss, Donkey and Artie up in a net. The pirates aim the cannon at Puss, Donkey and Artie. Artie starts to panic. Puss extracts his claws and tries to cut through the netting. The cannon fuse is lit. Shrek bursts open the treasure chest and stands up with the chest still stuck to his behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shrek!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Help! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 75. Shrek sees the lit fuse and quickly formulates a plan. He grabs two pirates and shoves them into the treasure chest. He tosses the chest onto the other end of the plank and catapults himself over to the cannon. At the last second, Shrek is able to aim the cannon in the opposite direction. The cannon fires and hits Captain Hook's piano, blowing it into pieces. Realizing their defeat, the Evil Trees drop the netting that holds Donkey, Puss and Artie. The Evil Trees and Pirates take off running. Captain Hook turns and sees his army running off. He shakes his hook in the air.

direction.raw_text: Ya cowards!

direction.raw_text: Ahhh. (YELLING BACK) And there ain't nothing you can do to stop him!

direction.raw_text: filled with worry. Nothing else matters to him now. Artie, Puss, and Donkey run over to Shrek.

direction.raw_text: Forget it. I don't have that kind of magic in me anymore, kid. How about a hug instead? Hmm? That's the best kind of magic. Artie tries a new approach.

direction.raw_text: Oh. What, what's with you? Artie continues to cry.

direction.raw_text: It's just so hard. You know? They really need to get back `cause their kingdom's in trouble `cause there's a really bad man and it's just so hard... Merlin is visibly uncomfortable.

direction.raw_text: Don't be! You got us back kid. Shrek motions to Far Far Away, just a few miles ahead of them. He turns back to Artie. Artie smiles. Donkey takes a few awkward steps in Puss' body.

CHARMING'S DRESSING ROOM -- MOMENTS LATER Prince Charming storms into his colossal gold leafed dressing room, its walls covered with posters of inspirational sayings and portraits of Prince Charming in different acting roles. Slamming the door, he plops down in his throne chair in front of a dressing table and large 3-way mirror. A statuette of his mother is on the vanity. He looks at it intently.

direction.raw_text: The thing that matters most is what you think of yourself. Artie commands the stage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If there's something you really want, or there's someone you really want to be, then the only person standing in your way ...is you. Artie points at Rumplestiltskin directly in front of him. Rumplestiltskin is alarmed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get `im lads!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no, no! What I mean is: each of you is standing in your own way!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oooooooh! The Headless Horseman breaks through the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've always wanted to play the flute. The Fairy-tale Villains and Creatures look at each other. The Evil Queen steps up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: `d like to open up a spa in France. The Villains nod in agreement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I grow daffodils! Complete silence as everyone stares at Hook.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And they're beautiful! Captain Hook looks thoughtfully at his sword, then throws it down. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 112. The pirates throw theirs down, followed by the witches and Evil Knights. The evil knight holding Pinocchio is thinking about it when Pinocchio reaches over and takes the ax from him. The weapons pile up in the middle of the stage. Everyone else cheers and starts to mingle, introducing themselves and shaking hands. Gingerbread Man high fives with an Evil Knight. Fiona is untied. Mabel walks up to Doris and lightly punches her on the jaw. Doris returns the sign of affection by punching Mabel in the jaw, but a bit too hard, sending her falling to the ground. Suddenly, Prince Charming kicks himself free of the Evil Tree and charges them. He grabs a sword from the discard pile and raises it up, his aim set at Artie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aaaahhhh! Despite his fear, Artie faces Prince Charming bravely. As Prince Charming charges, Shrek finds the strength to break his chains. Just before Prince Charming strikes, a chain whips into frame, wrapping around the sword. Shrek pulls Prince Charming around in a circle, away from Artie. Furious, he charges Shrek and stabs him with the sword. Charming lets go and Shrek stumbles back with the weapon impaled in him, and falls to the floor, groaning. Prince Charming beams, and laughs. He turns to the audience.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A new era finally begins! The audience cowers. Shrek looks up smiling and nods at Fiona and Artie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, all of you, bow before your king! Shrek casually rises up behind him and clears his throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah-hem. Charming turns around. Shrek lifts his arm revealing that he was never really stabbed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You need to work on your aim. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 113. Charming is stunned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This was supposed to be my happily ever after. Prince Charming is paralyzed. Shrek drops the sword and grabs him by the shirt-front, lifting him off of his feet. He winces, but is still defiant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well I guess you need to keep looking... Shrek looks at Fiona and at his friends and smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...cause I'm not giving up mine. Shrek sets Prince Charming down and signals DRAGON. She casually tips the tower over with her tail. A shadow falls over Prince Charming. He turns and sees the tower falling toward him, his body perfectly framed up in the princesses's window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mommy? It crashes down and he's trapped inside. As the dust clears, the crown rolls across the stage. Artie stops it with his foot and slowly picks it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's yours if you want it, you know, but this time it's your choice. Artie considers it. He looks at Shrek, who is smiling proudly at him. Artie turns to the audience and holds out the crown to them. They cheer him. Artie places the crown on his head. The crowd goes nuts. In the audience, Raul sobs with joy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ar-tie! Ar-tie! Ar-tie! Ar-tie! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 114. Everybody cheers as the Fairy-tale Creatures and Villains put Artie up on their shoulders and carry him off. Donkey and Puss, still in each other's bodies, watch as Artie gets carried away. In a puff of smoke, Merlin suddenly appears. He looks around confused, clutching his show ticket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, excuse me, that's my seat. Suddenly he is thrown back against the front of the stage as Donkey and Puss confront him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in Donkey's body) Okay, senor hocus-y pocus-y. The time has come to rectify some wrongs!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in Puss' body) Although I have been enjoying these "cat baths."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in Donkey's body) Please say you didn't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh... alright, alright...look.. Merlin rubs his hands together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're gonna feel a little pinch, and possibly some lower intestinal discomfort, but this should do the trick. Merlin rolls up his sleeves, and prepares to make with the magic. He lets loose with a bright burst of magic. It takes a moment for Donkey and Puss to recover. They eye each other cautiously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you..? Donkey lifts his hoof and inspects it carefully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm me again! Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 115. Puss checks out his own paws.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I am not you! Donkey and Puss give each other a big hug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright! The two of them turn and walk away together. Merlin is behind them, smoking fingers and all. Suddenly his eyes grow wide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oops. Ah, never mind. We see that Donkey still has Puss' tail and Puss had Donkey's. Merlin slips away. Shrek and Fiona watch Artie in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What'd I tell ya? I think the kid's going to be a great King.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, for what it's worth, you would have too. Shrek smiles, and touches Fiona's belly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have something much more important in mind. They kiss. The camera pulls back to see everyone celebrating around Shrek and Fiona as they kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A wide-shot of a sunny morning in the swamp. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 116.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shrek grabs a "gourd" bottle and creates an ogre shake out of slug juice, eye balls and worms. He walk over to join Fiona by the fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, finally. Shrek gives Fiona the "gourd" bottle and she places a nipple on it. Two ogre babies crawl up onto Fiona's lap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Da da. A third ogre baby appears at Shrek's feet. He bends down to pick him up. One big happy family of five. Shrek laughs and gives the babies and Fiona a hug. The front door opens up to reveal Puss and Donkey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! I smell Shrek Jr. The Dronkeys come swarming in behind Donkey. Dragon peers in through the door. Shrek with a safety pin in his mouth is doing his best at changing diapers. He twists the diaper around and the baby goes flying off screen and lands in a diaper that Fiona is holding. She smiles at Shrek. The swamp house is overrun with Dronkeys, ogre babies and dirty diapers. Puss sits next to an ogre baby that has a pacifier in his mouth. He takes the pacifier out of his mouth, shoves it in Puss' mouth and gives Puss a big hug. Another baby comes crawling into frame and starts to tug on Puss' tail. A tug of war ensues. The ogre babies are bathing in a pot of water (a la a beat from the Nightmare scene). One of the babies farts in the water as Shrek comes in and scoops them up. Shrek laughs. Donkey is playing "peek-a-boo" with his ears. A baby ogre laughs. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 117.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Peek-a-boo. Peek-a-boo. A baby ogre pulls ear wax from Shrek's ear. The baby uses the wax to draw squiggly lines on a piece of paper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bouncy, bouncy, bouncy boy. The Queen is bouncing a baby ogre on her lap. The baby pukes and the Queen smiles. There is a knock at the door. Donkey is laying on the floor holding a bottle with all four hooves, drinking the milk. Shrek grabs the bottle out of Donkey's mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey. Shrek opens the front door to reveal the Dwarf.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's the baby? Shrek puts a bottle into the Dwarf's mouth and slams the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fiona slides one of the babies down a "slip `n slide" made out of mud shot from geysers. Shrek slides down himself. The babies scramble out of the way as Shrek slides by, spraying mud everywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shrek and Fiona are diapering two of the babies in perfect unison. They continue diapering, Fiona holds up the third baby and Shrek holds up an unhappy, diapered Puss. Shrek grabs a gourd bottle off of a shelf. He tosses it to Fiona. Shrek the Third - Final Screening Script 118. Fiona stands holding one baby over her shoulder. She catches the gourd thrown to her, twirls it around (a la Tom Cruise in Cocktail), lifts up her leg where another baby is perched on her foot and puts the gourd in the baby's mouth. Shrek is burping a baby over his shoulder. The baby burps. Fiona has a baby over her shoulder and the baby burps. A Dronkey sitting on a chair does a flame-belch and an ogre baby crawling by farts which causes a flame thrower effect into the fireplace. Shrek and Fiona tuck all the babies into bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, what shall we do now?
direction.name: direction
